content.body: regrets for today's TG5 call; a conflicting meeting came up
Will the talk be recorded? I'm excited about the topic but I have an unmovable meeting at that time :/
(I'm personally ok with it being recorded)

> <@nicolo-ribaudo:matrix.org> (I'm personally ok with it being recorded)

Assuming there will be no objections, should we then record the presentation by Nicolò, and then stop the recording before the discussion begins?
